text: Richard James Milner, 3rd Baron Milner of Leeds (born 16 May 1959) is a British hereditary peer. ==Biography== Milner is the only son of Michael Milner, 2nd Baron Milner of Leeds, he was educated at Charterhouse School and the University of Surrey (BSc).‘MILNER OF LEEDS’, Who's Who 2014, A & C Black, an imprint of Bloomsbury Publishing plc, 2014 He succeeded to the peerage upon the death of his father in 2003. ==Marriage and children== Milner married Margaret Christine Voisin on 25 June 1988. They have two daughtersThe peerage.com, entry for 3rd Lord Milner of Leeds: * Hon Charlotte Emma Milner (born 8 May 1990) * Hon Nicola Louise Christine Milner (born 3 February 1992) Milner has no sons and there are no other heirs to the barony. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:People educated at Charterhouse School Category:Alumni of the University of Surrey Category:Barons in the Peerage of the United Kingdom
title: Richard Milner, 3rd Baron Milner of Leeds
